Article Title: India squad for T20 World Cup: Shubman Gill dropped; Ishan Kishan included in 15-member squad
Article Text:
Suryakumar Yadav and Gautam Gambhir (BCCI Photo)

NEW DELHI:

Curious case! Why Ajit Agarkar & Co. continue to ignore Ishan Kishan

Full Squads

India T20Is vs New Zealand:

India T20 World Cup:

Chief selector Ajit Agarkar on Saturday announced India‚Äôs squads for the upcoming ICC T20 World Cup and the five-match T20I series against New Zealand. The T20I series will begin on January 21 in Nagpur and will serve as India‚Äôs final assignment in the format before the global tournament, scheduled from February 7 to March 8.India have been drawn in Group A for the T20 World Cup, alongside Namibia, the Netherlands, Pakistan, and the United States. The hosts will open their campaign against the USA on February 7 in Mumbai.Despite a lean run with the bat in the recently concluded T20I series against South Africa, which India won 3‚Äì1, Suryakumar Yadav has been entrusted with the captaincy for the marquee event. In 20 matches and 18 innings this year, Suryakumar has scored 213 runs at an average of 14.20, striking at just over 125, without registering a single half-century.Suryakumar Yadav (c), Abhishek Sharma, Sanju Samson (wk), Tilak Varma, Hardik Pandya, Shivam Dube, Axar Patel, Jasprit Bumrah, Rinku Singh, Harshit Rana, Arshdeep Singh, Kuldeep Yadav, Varun Chakaravarthy, Washington Sundar, Ishan KishanSuryakumar Yadav (c), Abhishek Sharma, Sanju Samson (wk), Tilak Varma, Hardik Pandya, Shivam Dube, Axar Patel, Jasprit Bumrah, Rinku Singh, Harshit Rana, Arshdeep Singh, Kuldeep Yadav, Varun Chakaravarthy, Washington Sundar, Ishan KishanIndia‚Äôs T20 World Cup squad sees some major changes. Notably, Shubman Gill , who was India‚Äôs vice-captain in the T20 setup, has been dropped, with all-rounder Axar Patel named as the new vice-captain.Gill had struggled to find form since opening the innings. Brought back into the playing XI as part of the management‚Äôs long-term leadership plan, his performances remained underwhelming. In 15 T20 matches since his comeback, Gill has scored 291 runs at an average of 24.25 and a strike rate of 137, failing to register a single fifty.Meanwhile, Sanju Samson, who had performed exceptionally well, including scoring three centuries as an opener, was moved down the order. His Asia Cup performance was mixed, though he finished as India‚Äôs third-highest run-scorer with 132 runs, behind Abhishek Sharma (314) and Tilak Varma (213). A solitary outing in Australia at No. 3 yielded little impact, after which Samson was dropped from the playing XI.In the last T20 against South Africa, Samson opened the innings again and scored a solid 37 off 22 balls, giving India a good start. The team management now plans to return to their original composition of playing a wicketkeeper at the top. Consequently, Jitesh Sharma has been dropped, and Ishan Kishan has been drafted as the second keeper.Ishan Kishan and Rinku Singh make the T20 World Cup squad, while Shubman Gill and Jitesh Sharma miss out. Kishan comes off a stellar domestic season in the Syed Mushtaq Ali Trophy, where he captained Jharkhand to their maiden T20 title. He finished the season as the highest run-scorer, amassing 517 runs in 10 games at an average of 57.44 and a strike rate of 197.
Article Summary: Ishan kishan and rinku singh make the t20 world cup squad, while shubman gill and jitesh sharma miss out. Suryakumar yadav has been entrusted with the captaincy for the marquee event. The five-match t20i series against new zealand will begin on january 21 in nagpur.

Article Title: Hardik Pandya's monster hit injures cameraman; ice pack, hug follow - WATCH
Article Text:
Hardilk Pandya immediately walked up to check on the cameraman‚Äôs well-being after his innings (Image credit: BCCI)

Why the Mumbai Maidans are being ignored? | Bombay Sport Exchange

NEW DELHI: India all-rounder Hardik Pandya produced a blistering display of power-hitting to lead India to a commanding 30-run victory over South Africa in the fifth and final T20I in Ahmedabad on Friday, sealing the five-match series 3-1. Pandya‚Äôs explosive knock set the tone as India piled up a daunting 231 for 5.Pandya smashed a 16-ball half-century ‚Äî the second-fastest by an Indian in T20 internationals ‚Äî on his way to a stunning 63 off just 25 deliveries. His innings was laced with five boundaries and five towering sixes.The carnage was complemented by Tilak Varma, who continued his rich vein of form with a fluent 73. Together, the duo stitched a punishing 105-run partnership for the fourth wicket that completely wrested momentum away from the visitors.One of Pandya‚Äôs massive sixes led to an unexpected moment off the field when the ball struck a cameraman stationed near the boundary.Showing concern beyond the contest, Pandya immediately walked up to check on the cameraman‚Äôs well-being after his innings, ensuring he was attended to and even helping apply an ice pack.Pandya also hugged the cameraman, a gesture that quickly went viral and earned widespread praise from fans.In reply, South Africa began positively and remained in the chase as long as Quinton de Kock was at the crease. The left-hander scored a fighting 65, but once he was dismissed, the innings unravelled rapidly. Varun Chakravarthy spun a web around the middle order, claiming four wickets as South Africa lost seven wickets for 81 runs to finish on 201 for 8.Pandya‚Äôs all-round impact and match-defining innings earned him the Player of the Match award."Winning games is what you play for and it‚Äôs always exciting when your contribution helps the team get over the line. No, I actually didn‚Äôt know (he has the second fastest fifty for India) until I got out and went back. Our social media guys told me I was the second-fastest," Pandya said.Watch the video here "My first reaction was, ‚ÄúAh, I missed the top spot!‚Äù But happy that Yuvi pa holds that record. Today I just felt it. I actually told my partner beforehand that I was going to step out first ball and try to hit it for six. I was confident it would come off," he said."The situation suited my style; I backed myself and it worked. I took a calculated risk and thankfully it went my way. I‚Äôve always enjoyed the challenge. No matter how many setbacks you face, the aim is to come back stronger, better, and make a bigger impact. When it all comes together, it feels satisfying. But the journey continues - the preparation, the planning, the hard work never stops," Pandya said.
Article Summary: India beat south africa by 30 runs in the fifth and final t20i in ahmedabad. All-rounder hardik pandya scored 63 off just 25 deliveries. Pandya's half-century was the second-fastest by an indian in t20 internationals.

Article Title: Luka Doncic pulls off heartfelt gesture surprising kids in Slovenia as part of pre-Christmas celebration
Article Text:
Image via getty

Luka Doncic Foundation surprised kids at Sentvid pri Sticni hospital with pizzas and gifts

What did Luka Doncic gift his teammates?

Also Read

Luka Doncic is known for his generosity in the world of basketball. Recently, he gifted 100+ e-bikes to his teammates and staff. The Los Angeles Lakers once again won everyone‚Äôs heart by carrying out an adorable gesture. On Wednesday, December 17, 2025, the athlete‚Äôs foundation went on to surprise the children at the Sentvid pri Sticni Hospital. Luka celebrated Christmas in advance while creating a ‚Äúmagical‚Äù atmosphere with pizzas and gifts.The foundation is based in Ljubljana and Los Angeles. It is a youth development foundation and tries to bring in a positive change in the world. Their work includes youth development, creative play spaces, wellness programs, research & advocacy and community partnerships. Luka has been involved in several communities, having originated from Slovenia and played in Dallas, and is now based in Los Angeles. This journey of the athlete has heavily inspired the foundation.Luka Doncic recently surprised his teammates with a special gift. Now the athlete decided to surprise a bunch of children at the Sentvid pri Sticni Hospital in Slovenia. His foundation brought in pizzas and gifts for each one of the children in the hospital.The clip that went viral displayed the happiness of these children upon receiving the gifts. The children looked both happy and surprised as they opened the gifts and munched on their pizzas. There were toys, balloons and a lot more. A letter from the Luka Doncic Foundation was attached to each one of the gifts. It was written in Slovene language and translated to, ‚ÄúHi friends, happy holidays! I hope this gift will put a smile on your face and make you very happy. I want you to know that I am very proud of your courage and strength. I wish you all the best in the new year 2026! Happy New Year!‚ÄùThe official page of the foundation posted clips and pictures from the celebration. They added a caption where the details of the event was mentioned. It read, ‚ÄúThis Wednesday, Luka created a real magical atmosphere for the children in ≈†entvid pri Stiƒçni Hospital and surprised them with a festive party with pizzas and presents! Sending you all lots of love and joy this holiday season! üéÑ‚ú®‚Äù From the clips and images uploaded, it could be seen that the gesture was well received and it was indeed a heartwarming moment for both the foundation and the children. The foundation members spent time with the children playing basketball.Los Angeles Lakers star Luka Doncic turned Santa Claus for his teammates. The athlete gifted over 100 E-Bikes to the team members and staff. It was a high-end bike, as explained by the team‚Äôs head coach, JJ Redick, in one of the interviews. All the players and members were surprised and highly excited because of the gift. There was a small bag that was hung on each bike, probably assigned to each player.
Article Summary: Los angeles lakers star luka doncic turned santa claus for his teammates. The athlete gifted over 100 e-bikes to the team members and staff. Now the athlete decided to surprise a bunch of children at the sentvid pri sticni hospital in slovenia. His foundation brought in pizzas and gifts for each one of the children.

Article Title: Vanessa Bryant‚Äôs net worth in 2025: Exploring wealth, legacy, and responsibility after Kobe Bryant‚Äôs untimely passing
Article Text:
Vanessa Bryant (Image Via: Getty Images)

What is Vanessa Bryant's net worth as of 2025?

Inside Vanessa Bryants Life, House Tour, Net Worth

How Vanessa Bryant is turning loss into leadership and lasting impact, honouring late husband Kobe Bryant and daughter Gianna Bryant?

The late Lakers legend, Kobe Bryant‚Äôs widow, Venessa Bryant, is the executor of the vast financial legacy built during Kobe Bryant's iconic NBA career. In January 2020, Kobe Bryant and their daughter Gianna died in a helicopter crash. After Bryant‚Äôs passing in 2020, Vanessa Bryant inherited most of his money, including what he earned from basketball, endorsements, etc.Most of this wealth comes from his NBA salary, his investments, such as BodyArmor and their company, Bryant Stibel. Vanessa now manages these finances and makes important decisions about the family‚Äôs money. One major gain came from the sale of BodyArmor to Coca-Cola, which brought in a large amount of money for the family.As of 2025, Vanessa Bryant's net worth is estimated to be around $600 million as per Celebrity Net Worth. After Kobe Bryant‚Äôs sudden passing in 2020, Vanessa Bryant became the manager of his financial empire that he built, meaning she makes key decisions about how money and investments are handled. She continues to handle holdings in companies like BodyArmor, whose sale to Coca-Cola brought huge financial gains to the Bryant family.Vanessa also manages real estate and other assets inherited from Kobe. In 2023, Vanessa Bryant won a nearly $29 million lawsuit settlement against Los Angeles County over privacy violations after the crash. She chose to donate the money to the Mamba & Mambacita Sports Foundation.After Kobe Bryant‚Äôs tragic death in 2020, Vanessa Bryant became the sole person responsible for managing his financial legacy. She handles and manages income earned from his NBA career, endorsements, and business ventures. A large part of the family‚Äôs wealth comes from his investments, including BodyArmor and Bryant Stibel, with the BodyArmor sale proving especially significant.Additionally, one of Vanessa Bryant‚Äôs key roles is serving as the President and CEO of Granity Studios, the multimedia company Kobe Bryant founded. Under her leadership, the company keeps producing books, shows, and creative content inspired by Kobe‚Äôs vision.She also launched Mambacita clothing in 2021, a project honoring her late daughter Gianna Bryant. All profits from the clothing business support her foundation‚Äôs programs for young athletes. Vanessa Bryant continues to lead the Mamba & Mambacita Sports Foundation, a nonprofit that supports underserved youth athletes, along with managing ongoing brand partnerships with Nike and other key collaborators.Also Read: Kobe Bryant‚Äôs wife Vanessa Bryant shares a quiet Instagram glimpse of her new princess with 15.6 million followers
Article Summary: Vanessa bryant's net worth is estimated to be around $600 million as of 2025. She is the executor of the vast financial legacy built during kobe bryant's iconic nba career. Most of this wealth comes from his nba salary, his investments, such as bodyarmor and bryant stibel.

Article Title: Sherrone Moore situation affects Michigan Wolverines‚Äô locker room as CB Zeke Berry admits feeling ‚Äúbetrayed‚Äù amid alleged affair scandal
Article Text:
Sherrone Moore's alleged affair has affected the team.(Image via X)

Sherrone Moore‚Äôs former team, Michigan Wolverines‚Äô players open up about how the alleged affair affected the team



Football Press Conference: Zeke Berry (Dec. 19)

What allegedly happened between Sherrone Moore and Paige Shiver?



Sherrone Moore and his alleged affair partner, Paige Shiver, have sparked shockwaves across the league ever since the former coach was fired by the University of Michigan and was later arrested.As Sherrone Moore and Paige Shiver remain silent about their alleged affair, the University of Michigan‚Äôs football team, the Michigan Wolverines‚Äô players have now spoken about how it has affected the team.A few hours ago, the Michigan Wolverines cornerback and popular player, Zeke Berry, has now gone public with how the team is feeling ‚Äúbetrayed‚Äù.Michigan Wolverines cornerback, Zeke Berry, spoke to the media as he said, ‚ÄúJust reaching out to people for help, talking about things‚Ä¶‚ÄùWhen asked if the team felt betrayed by Sherrone Moore‚Äôs alleged actions, Zeke Berry said, ‚ÄúI guess you could say that‚Ä¶‚ÄùThe team‚Äôs star player added, ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs probably different for different people, but I feel like it‚Äôs a good thing for most people that do feel like that.‚ÄùMichigan Wolverines cornerback, Zeke Berry, continued, ‚ÄúThey‚Äôre doing a good job of trying to keep the players focused on what we have in front of us‚Ä¶Not to really focus on what‚Äôs in the past because we still got a big game to play.‚ÄùHowever, amid all the mess, neither Sherrone Moore nor Paige Shiver has responded to the trolling and all the rumors about their alleged affair.For the unversed, on 10th December, the University of Michigan released a statement that read as, ‚ÄúU-M head football coach Sherrone Moore has been terminated, with cause, effective immediately.Following a University investigation, credible evidence was found that Coach Moore engaged in an inappropriate relationship with a staff member.‚ÄùWhile the University of Michigan have stayed silent about Sherrone Moore‚Äôs affair partner, fans have been quick to link it to Paige Shiver as the former coach was also arrested.Sherrone Moore faces criminal allegations of felony third-degree home invasion, misdemeanor stalking-domestic relationship, and misdemeanor breaking and entering, and awaits a hearing on 22nd January, 2026.Also Read: "You ruined my life": New court documents reveal disturbing details of what happened between Sherrone Moore and the woman he allegedly attacked
Article Summary: Sherrone moore's alleged affair has affected the team. Michigan wolverines cornerback, zeke berry, has now gone public with how the team is feeling ‚Äòbetrayed‚Äô neither sherrone moore nor paige shiver has responded to the trolling and all the rumors about their alleged affair.

Article Title: Puka Nacua deletes tweet after doubling down on ref criticism following Seahawks loss
Article Text:
Image via Getty

Career night ends in frustration for Rams star

Sean McVay stands by Puka Nacua

Also Read:

Los Angeles Rams wide receiver Puka Nacua once again found himself at the center of controversy following Thursday night‚Äôs dramatic loss to the Seattle Seahawks, as frustration over officiating spilled onto social media before being quickly walked back.Despite producing the best game of his young NFL career, Nacua‚Äôs postgame reaction overshadowed what should have been a headline performance.Nacua was nearly unstoppable against Seattle, finishing with 12 receptions for 225 yards and two touchdowns. The second-year receiver repeatedly torched the Seahawks‚Äô secondary and played a key role as the Rams built a commanding 16-point lead.However, Los Angeles watched that advantage disappear, eventually falling 38-37 in overtime. A late officiating decision that went against the Rams became a major talking point, drawing visible frustration from players on the sideline and fans watching at home.Shortly after the final whistle, Nacua took to X (formerly Twitter) and appeared to take a jab at NFL officials. ‚ÄúCan you say I was wrong,‚Äù he wrote, adding, ‚ÄúAppreciate you stripes for your contributions. Lol.‚ÄùThe post was deleted within minutes, but screenshots spread rapidly, ensuring the message reached a wide audience.The timing and wording were widely seen as a direct reference to a controversial late-game call that helped Seattle extend the contest and ultimately secure the win.When asked about the tweet after the game, Nacua acknowledged that emotions got the better of him. ‚ÄúIt was just a lack of awareness and frustration after a tough, intense game,‚Äù he said.The wide receiver admitted that while players often feel inconsistencies in officiating, those thoughts should remain internal. ‚ÄúThere are comments that I should definitely say in the locker room,‚Äù Nacua explained. ‚ÄúMy job is to focus on my technique so there‚Äôs no issue with the call.‚ÄùRams head coach Sean McVay was initially unaware of the deleted post during his postgame press conference, declining to comment on something he had not yet seen. However, McVay has already publicly backed Nacua earlier in the week following separate controversy stemming from a livestream appearance.‚ÄúI know this guy‚Äôs heart,‚Äù McVay said previously. ‚ÄúHe‚Äôs a great kid who‚Äôs continuing to learn about the platform that he has. We‚Äôre going to put our arm around him and help him grow.‚ÄùPublic criticism of officiating has historically drawn fines from the league, and Nacua‚Äôs latest comments could again put him on the NFL‚Äôs radar. The situation comes at an awkward time, as the receiver had only just issued an apology earlier in the week for unrelated remarks.For the Rams, the priority remains correcting late-game execution after another painful loss. For Nacua, the message is becoming clearer: his elite on-field performances are undeniable, but staying out of controversy off the field will be just as important as the season progresses.
Article Summary: Los angeles rams wide receiver puka nacua took to twitter after thursday night's loss to the seattle seahawks. He appeared to take a jab at nfl officials, saying, ‚Äúcan you say i was wrong? Lol‚Äù the post was deleted within minutes, but screenshots spread rapidly, ensuring the message reached a wide audience.

Article Title: Carlos Alcaraz net worth in 2025: Tennis star earnings, career, endorsements, business, lifestyle, and more
Article Text:
Carlos Alcaraz net worth in 2025: Tennis star earnings, career, endorsements, business, lifestyle, and more (Image via Getty)

Carlos Alcaraz career and prize money growth

Carlos Alcaraz net worth in 2025 explained

Carlos Alcaraz endorsements and brand deals

Carlos Alcaraz investments, lifestyle, and recent updates

Carlos Alcaraz is one of the biggest stars in tennis today. He comes from Spain and turned pro as a teenager. Even at a young age, he has already won major titles and earned millions of dollars. In 2025, Carlos Alcaraz is not just winning matches. He is also earning big money from prize winnings and brand deals. His success on the court and his calm nature off the court have made him popular with fans and companies around the world. Let‚Äôs have a look at his net worth in 2025.Carlos Alcaraz has built most of his wealth from tennis prize money. According to the ATP Tour, he won the US Open in 2022, Wimbledon in 2023 and 2024, and the French Open in 2024. These wins brought him tens of millions of dollars.By the end of 2024, his career prize money crossed $30 million, as per ATP records. He entered the 2025 season as one of the top-ranked players in the world and remains a strong title contender in every tournament he plays.Carlos Alcaraz‚Äôs net worth in 2025 is estimated to be between $30 million and $40 million. This estimate is based on prize money, endorsements, and appearance income, according to Forbes and Celebrity Net Worth.His earnings grow every year because he reaches late rounds in most events. Even when he does not win a title, deep tournament runs still bring large payouts. His young age also means his earning potential is far from its peak.Carlos Alcaraz earns a large part of his income from endorsements. His confirmed sponsors include Nike (apparel and shoes), Babolat (racquets), and Rolex (watches).Forbes named him one of the highest-paid tennis players in 2024, mainly due to off-court income. Brands value his clean image, calm behavior, and global fan base, which continues to grow every season.Carlos Alcaraz lives a very simple and noiseless life, even though he gets a lot of money. Mainly, he trains in Spain and is very close to his family. He rarely mentions his wealth. However, it is said in the Spanish press that he has bought some properties in Spain with the money he has.In the last news, Carlos Alcaraz started the year 2025 in a perfect condition after he had closed 2024 with a very powerful note. His priority is still tennis, which proves that he is more interested in lasting acknowledgment than in the easy and quick one.Also Read: What is Maria Sharapova net worth in 2025? Tennis legend earings, business, and career success
Article Summary: Carlos alcaraz is one of the biggest stars in tennis today. He won the us open in 2022, wimbledon in 2023 and 2024, and the french open in 2024. By the end of 2024, his career prize money crossed $30 million, as per atp records. His net worth in 2025 is estimated to be between $30 and $40 million.

Article Title: Who is Oklahoma football QB John Mateer? Inside the betting controversy and his College Football Playoff run
Article Text:
Who is Oklahoma football QB John Mateer? Inside the betting controversy and his College Football Playoff run (Image via Getty)



John Mateer‚Äôs path to Oklahoma football, his faith, and the betting allegations

University of Oklahoma quarterback John Mateer has had a college football journey full of big moments, tough questions, and deep belief. At just 21 years old, he became one of the biggest names in Oklahoma football during his first season in Norman. Mateer helped the Sooners reach the College Football Playoff after a strong 10‚Äì2 season. Oklahoma also finished the year with four straight wins, showing clear growth when it mattered most. But John Mateer‚Äôs path was not smooth. Before he ever took a snap for Oklahoma, his name was linked to a viral sports betting claim. At the same time, Mateer has openly spoken about his faith and how prayer shaped his journey. From a transfer decision to public pressure, his story has drawn attention across college football.As Oklahoma prepared to face Alabama in the first round of the CFP, Mateer made one thing clear, he does not take any moment for granted.‚ÄúThis is everything I could ever ask for as a kid,‚Äù Mateer told reporters on Monday, December 15. ‚ÄúI prayed for this opportunity, worked for it, and I‚Äôm glad it‚Äôs here. I don‚Äôt take it for granted.‚ÄùJohn Mateer was born in Little Elm, Texas, where football is a big part of life. While his parents were both swimmers, Mateer chose a different road.His father later became a swimming coach at the University of Texas, but football was always Mateer‚Äôs passion.‚ÄúIn Dallas, football is so big,‚Äù Mateer told Cougfan.com. ‚ÄúI played both football and baseball through high school and just didn‚Äôt have any interest in swimming.‚ÄùJohn Mateer began his college career at Washington State Cougars. After redshirting in 2022, he played 11 games in 2023. In 2024, he won the starting job and had a breakout year, throwing for 3,139 yards and 29 touchdowns. That season changed everything.In December 2024, Mateer announced his transfer to the Oklahoma Sooners. Soon after, screenshots appeared online in August 2025 showing old Venmo payments labeled ‚Äúsports gambling.‚Äù The claims spread fast.John Mateer responded on X with a clear statement.‚ÄúThe allegations that I once participated in sports gambling are false,‚Äù he wrote. ‚ÄúMy previous Venmo descriptions did not accurately portray the transactions in question but were instead inside jokes between me and my friends. I have never bet on sports.‚ÄùHe added, ‚ÄúI understand the seriousness of the matter‚Ä¶ I can assure my teammates, coaches, and officials at the NCAA that I have not engaged in any sports gambling.‚ÄùJohn Mateer was not suspended and faced no punishment.Away from football, his faith remains central. On July 4, 2023, John Mateer shared a video of his baptism on Instagram from his time at Washington State, writing, ‚ÄúThank You God!‚ÄùAlso Read: How Police Secretly Tracked Missing Football Coach Travis Turner Before Child Abuse Charges Came To Light?
Article Summary: University of oklahoma quarterback john mateer has had a college football journey full of big moments, tough questions, and deep belief. At just 21 years old, he became one of the biggest names in oklahoma football during his first season in norman. Mateer helped the sooners reach the college football playoff after a strong 10‚Äì2 season.

Article Title: ‚ÄòThank you for lifting Patrick up‚Äô: Randi Mahomes‚Äô gratitude filled response after Patrick Mahomes‚Äô knee surgery makes fans feel included and cherished
Article Text:
Randi Mahomes thanks fans for their prayers as Patrick Mahomes begins rehab after season-ending knee surgery. (Image via Getty)

Patrick Mahomes‚Äô injury, surgery, and the timeline Kansas City is now staring at

Randi Mahomes thanked supporters as Patrick Mahomes posted ‚Äòwhy this had to happen‚Äô

Patrick Mahomes is already in rehab after a season-ending left knee injury, and his mom is making it clear she is reading every message that comes in. Randi Mahomes posted public thanks this week after the Kansas City Chiefs quarterback underwent surgery, telling supporters she and her family appreciate the prayers and the words of encouragement.The update lands at the worst possible moment for Kansas City. Mahomes tore his left ACL and LCL in Week 15 against the Los Angeles Chargers, and the loss pushed the Chiefs out of playoff contention for the first time in the Mahomes era.Athlon Sports reported Mahomes suffered the injury against the Chargers and later underwent surgery on Monday. The report said the procedure was performed by Dallas Cowboys head physician and orthopedic surgeon Dan Cooper. Kansas City placed Mahomes on injured reserve, and the quarterback has already begun rehab.The medical timeline matters because it shapes everything the Chiefs do next. Chiefs vice president of sports medicine and performance Rick Burkholder said the recovery expectation is nine months, though it could swing by a month or two in either direction, per USA Today. That puts Mahomes‚Äô 2026 season availability at the center of every offseason decision, even if the team stays quiet publicly.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.Mahomes‚Äô injury also closes the book on a season where he still produced. Athlon Sports noted he recorded 22 passing touchdowns and five rushing scores in 2025 before the knee gave out. Now the conversation shifts from stats to survival: how Kansas City steadies itself without the player it has been built around, and how quickly Mahomes can get back to full strength.The Chiefs missing the playoffs is the loudest headline. Athlon Sports called the Chargers loss the final blow to Kansas City‚Äôs postseason hopes. It is also a rare swing in the Mahomes era. Andy Reid‚Äôs teams had been a January constant, and Athlon Sports noted Kansas City reached the Super Bowl five times in the last six seasons, winning three. That is the standard Mahomes and the Chiefs are judged by, and it is why this injury lands like a crisis instead of a routine rehab story.The emotional side of this hit the public right away. TMZ reported Mahomes posted a message on X after the injury report became public, and he did not try to dress it up.‚ÄúDon‚Äôt know why this had to happen,‚Äù Mahomes wrote. ‚ÄúAnd not going to lie, it‚Äôs hurts. But all we can do now is Trust in God and attack every single day over and over again.‚Äù He also addressed the fan base directly in the same TMZ report.‚ÄúThank you, Chiefs kingdom, for always supporting me and for everyone who has reached out and sent prayers. I will be back stronger than ever.‚ÄùTMZ noted Randi Mahomes shared his message with a heart and prayer emoji, and her own posts kept the focus on gratitude. Athlon Sports reported she wrote a public message while also sharing about her ‚ÄúHome for the Holidays‚Äù event for the Kansas City community.‚ÄúThank you all for the prayers and kind messages for Patrick. We truly appreciate every one of them,‚Äù she wrote.Athlon Sports also reported she added a second note on her Instagram Stories. ‚ÄúThank you for lifting Patrick up in prayer. We‚Äôre so thankful for this community.‚ÄùThat is the cleanest read on the moment. The family is not selling false optimism. They are acknowledging reality, leaning on faith, and keeping the message tight: Mahomes has surgery behind him, rehab in front of him, and a fan base watching every step.For the Chiefs, the next part is not dramatic. It is practical. Mahomes‚Äô rehab is the story now, and the rest of the roster gets judged by how it responds to life without him. The one piece of good news, per Athlon Sports, is that Mahomes is on track to return to full health when the 2026 NFL season comes around. The rest is patience, and nine months can feel like forever when you are Kansas City.Moreover, Travis Kelce addressed speculation about his future with Patrick Mahomes on Friday, Dec. 19, after reporters asked whether the two might no longer play together following Mahomes‚Äô season-ending knee injury. The 36-year-old Kansas City Chiefs tight end called the idea hard to process, responding, ‚ÄúOh man, that‚Äôs crazy,‚Äù before making it clear his focus remains on the team. Kelce acknowledged this is ‚Äúa unique time‚Äù in his career but stressed that he is locked in on finishing the season strong, saying he wants the attention on winning games and supporting the locker room rather than discussing what comes next.What's interesting is that the Tennessee Titans host the Kansas City Chiefs on Dec. 21 at Nissan Stadium, still searching for their first home win in 413 days after last winning in Nashville on Nov. 3, 2024, against the New England Patriots. Tennessee faces a rare opportunity against a Chiefs team already eliminated from playoff contention and without Patrick Mahomes, who suffered ACL and LCL tears last week. Gardner Minshew is set to start at quarterback, leading most analysts to expect a close, low-scoring game with mixed predictions on whether the Titans can finally snap their home losing streak.
Article Summary: Randi mahomes thanks fans for their prayers as patrick mahomes begins rehab after season-ending knee surgery. Mahomes tore his left acl and lcl in week 15 against the los angeles chargers. Chiefs vice president of sports medicine and performance rick burkholder said the recovery expectation is nine months.

Article Title: Maple Leafs fans on edge after reporter claims Auston Matthews trade talks may be closer than believed
Article Text:
Auston Matthews trade rumor (Getty Images)

Auston Matthews and the pressure point Toronto cannot ignore

The mood around the Maple Leafs has shifted from confidence to caution. Toronto entered the season expecting its captain to set the pace, yet nights now pass where the scoreboard stays silent for stretches that feel unfamiliar. Auston Matthews still generates chances, still competes hard in all three zones, but goals no longer arrive with the same inevitability. In a market that measures greatness shift by shift, that absence has grown louder than any cheer.What makes this moment heavier is timing. Toronto is not rebuilding or experimenting. This is a team built to win now. When production stalls at the center of that plan, anxiety spreads quickly. Conversations that once felt unthinkable are now whispered openly, not because Matthews has fallen off, but because expectations around him remain sky high.The tension spiked when Maple Leafs reporter Howard Berger suggested the organization will not move forward until Auston Matthews asks for a trade, possibly by this year‚Äôs trade deadline. That idea alone rattled the fanbase. Matthews has been the franchise constant for nearly a decade.Imagining Toronto without him feels like pulling a load-bearing wall from the house.On the ice, the frustration has roots. Auston Matthews continues to win faceoffs, backcheck, and handle defensive responsibility. Yet Toronto pays him to swing games offensively. At five-on-five, his line has not consistently owned shifts. On the power play, the dominance that once felt automatic has faded into predictability. The looks are there, but the finish has gone missing.That gap between effort and outcome feeds scrutiny. In Toronto, leadership is judged through goals when the stakes rise. When scoring dries up, every shift becomes a test of authority and legacy. Nick Kypreos tried to strike a more hopeful tone in the Toronto Star, but optimism struggles to breathe when results lag behind reputation.The coaching staff has searched for answers. Different wingers, altered looks, and tactical tweaks have come and gone. The puck still moves well, but the instinctive scoring touch that defined Matthews has not returned with consistency. There is also quiet talk of tension with coach Craig Berube, another layer that complicates an already delicate situation.Trading a captain in his prime is not standard practice. Neither is standing still while doubt grows inside a contender. Toronto management now faces a narrow path where action and inaction both carry consequences. Whether Berger‚Äôs report proves prophetic or premature, it captures how fragile this stretch feels.Matthews remains elite. Yet in this market, elite alone no longer settles the noise. The next few months will decide more than standings. They will define how this era is remembered, and whether Auston Matthews and Toronto find clarity together or part under pressure.Also Read: Are Auston Matthews and Craig Berube drifting apart as Maple Leafs struggles spark tense locker-room speculation?
Article Summary: The mood around the maple leafs has shifted from confidence to caution. Auston matthews still generates chances, still competes hard in all three zones, but goals no longer arrive with the same inevitability. In a market that measures greatness shift by shift, that absence has grown louder than any cheer.

Article Title: Was Anthony Joshua vs Jake Paul fight scripted or real? Jeff Powell‚Äôs ringside view from Miami raises doubts
Article Text:
Was Anthony Joshua vs Jake Paul fight scripted or real? Jeff Powell‚Äôs ringside view from Miami raises doubts (Image via Getty)

Anthony Joshua vs Jake Paul fight night showed spectacle first, boxing second

Anthony Joshua did what most people expected him to do. He beat Jake Paul. Anything else would have been a disaster for his career. A two-time heavyweight world champion losing to a YouTuber was never an option. Still, the fight raised one big question. Why did it take so long?Many fans thought the fight would end in one round. Instead, it lasted until the sixth. That delay made people talk. Was it planned? Was it scripted to make Jake Paul look brave and tough? No clear answer exists. And it may never come.Anthony Joshua never said the fight was fixed. Paul denied nothing either. He fought on with a broken jaw and later said, ‚ÄúI had a blast. This is what boxing‚Äôs all about.‚Äù For many, that line felt hard to accept. A smaller man taking punishment from a heavyweight champion is not what boxing should be. Still, Paul survived. That alone surprised millions watching around the world on Netflix.The fight took place at the Kaseya Center in Miami, a 20,000-seat arena. Tickets were still available when fans arrived, but the crowd filled up by the main event. The buzz came less from boxing love and more from curiosity.Netflix was the real driver. With over 300 million subscribers worldwide, even a small share of viewers meant massive reach. This was entertainment first. Boxing came second.Anthony Joshua entered wearing a fashion-style battle outfit. Paul danced his way in with yellow sunglasses. The mood felt strange. More wonder than wild excitement. The American announcers tried to hype the crowd, shouting, ‚ÄúMake some noise,‚Äù but it took time.Inside the ring, Joshua started slow. Paul moved well and even seemed to win the first round with quick shots. Joshua picked it up in the second but held back his big right hand. Paul mixed movement with clinching. Anthony Joshua wrestled him down instead of finishing him. The referee warned him for that.The ring was bigger than usual. It looked designed to give Paul more space to move and avoid being trapped. That raised more eyebrows. Then things changed. Joshua stopped playing. He landed clean shots. Paul went down hard. The fight ended when Joshua finally let his power go.Afterward, Anthony Joshua looked ahead. He said, ‚ÄúIf Tyson means it I‚Äôm ready,‚Äù hinting at a future fight with Tyson Fury. Big money talks are already happening, with Saudi backers ready to pay even more. As for Jake Paul, he promised more strange matchups. Just maybe not another one with someone as dangerous as Anthony Joshua.Also Read: Anthony Joshua Net Worth In 2025: Inside His Boxing Earnings, Career, And Payday Before Jake Paul Fight
Article Summary: Was anthony joshua vs jake paul fight scripted or real? Jeff powell‚Äôs ringside view from miami raises doubts. Many fans thought the fight would end in one round. Instead, it lasted until the sixth. Was it planned? Was it scripted to make jake paul look brave and tough? No clear answer exists.

Article Title: Seth Jarvis injury update: Carolina Hurricanes star expected to miss significant time after undisclosed setback, Rod Brind‚ÄôAmour confirms
Article Text:
Seth Jarvis sidelined after injury against Panthers (Image via: Getty Images)

How Seth Jarvis‚Äô injury could impact the Carolina Hurricanes‚Äô season



Seth Jarvis‚Äô injury has sent a push through the Carolina Hurricanes‚Äô season at a time when consistency and scoring depth were all that mattered. The forward went down hard in overtime against the Florida Panthers at Amerant Bank Arena, and the result is worrying for the team as he is set to be ‚Äúout for a while,‚Äù as per the head coach Rod Brind‚ÄôAmour.The moment unfolded quickly and brutally. Twenty seconds into overtime, Jarvis drove hard to the net while being pressured by Evan Rodrigues and crashed full speed into the left post. He could not get back to his feet on his own, needed support to leave the ice, and disappeared. Brind‚ÄôAmour did not sugarcoat it afterward, calling the injury ‚Äúnot good,‚Äù leaving Carolina fans concerned about a significant absence.Before the injury, Jarvis was not just another piece of the lineup. He was one of the Hurricanes‚Äô most productive forwards this season, sitting second on the team with 29 points from 19 goals and 10 assists in just 34 games. He also delivered two assists in that very game, helping Carolina race to a 3-0 lead before Florida fought back, forced overtime, and eventually won 4-3 in a shootout. Losing a player producing at that level is a major competitive blow.Beyond current form, Jarvis has been a central part of Carolina‚Äôs offense in recent years.The 23-year-old star has already established himself as a well-renowned name in the NHL with 240 points under his belt and a pattern of upping his game come playoff time with 43 points in 55 postseason games. This particular skill of his makes the injury particularly troublesome with a Hurricane franchise still seeking consistency.With no fixed time frame on when he would return, Carolina finds himself dealing with lineups that will need some changes, new roles, and new players being called on to provide the same level of point production that Jarvis brings. His absence changes matchups, special-teams decisions, and overall offensive rhythm. For a team built on depth and structure, this is a real test. As the Hurricanes navigate the coming weeks, every update on Seth Jarvis will matter because his health could shape not only their immediate stretch of games but also the direction of their season.Also Read: Seth Jarvis injury update: Andrei Svechnikov‚Äôs high stick takes Hurricanes forward out with upper-body setback
Article Summary: Seth jarvis went down hard in overtime against the florida panthers. Head coach rod brind‚Äôamour called the injury ‚Äúnot good,‚Äù leaving carolina fans concerned about a significant absence. Jarvis was one of the hurricanes‚Äô most productive forwards this season, sitting second on the team with 29 points.

Article Title: Montreal Canadiens bring back Phillip Danault from Los Angeles Kings in major trade move
Article Text:
Phillip Danault reunites with Montreal Canadiens (Image via: Getty Images)

The Montreal Canadiens‚Äô strategy in bringing back Phillip Danault from Los Angeles Kings



The Montreal Canadiens have reacquired center Phillip Danault from the Los Angeles Kings in exchange for a second-round pick in the 2026 NHL Draft. Danault, 32, returns to the team where he played from 2015 through 2021, bringing familiarity, experience, and stability to Montreal‚Äôs lineup as the team looks to improve midseason.Danault‚Äôs return is straightforward: the Canadiens wanted to get better. Known for his defensive reliability and versatility, he can contribute at both ends of the ice. With one year remaining on his $5.5 million contract, Danault adds depth down the middle while mentoring younger players in Montreal‚Äôs roster.Danault was originally a first-round pick by the Chicago Blackhawks in 2011 and has since played 741 NHL games, scoring 399 points, including 125 goals and 274 assists. In 62 playoff games, he scored 28 points, proving his ability to perform in high-pressure scenarios.From 2015 to 2021, Danault recorded 194 points in 360 games with the Canadiens. He has five assists in 30 games this season with the Kings, but he does more than just score. He can handle challenging matchups against elite opponents and is a good defensive player who excels on penalty kills.Adding Phillip Danault to the lineup is also expected to bring some stability to the team's scoring lineup because Danault has extensive experience with the system used by the team.Danault‚Äôs experience with the Canadiens goes beyond the stats as well. He knows the locker room, the culture of the team, as well as the ability to mentor some of the young players. This will go a long way in maintaining some sort of balance, something the Canadiens would need as they make a push for the playoffs.In general, the Canadiens are doing what is required of them at this stage; this is because the team is looking for a trusted and seasoned center who can play the opposition from start to finish. The return of Danault is expected to boost the depth, veteran leadership, and overall performance of the Canadiens ahead of the playoffs.Also Read: NHL trade rumors: Phillip Danault linked with potential move from LA Kings as Montreal Canadiens, New Jersey Devils and Carolina Hurricanes emerge as top contendors
Article Summary: The montreal canadiens have reacquired center phillip danault from the los angeles kings in exchange for a second-round pick in the 2026 nhl draft. Danault, 32, returns to the team where he played from 2015 through 2021, bringing familiarity, experience, and stability to montreal‚Äôs lineup.

Article Title: Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce shift their attention elsewhere amid strong rumors of the Chiefs' tight end opting for retirement
Article Text:
Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce remain silent amid all the trolling.(Image via Backgrid)

Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce are fully focused on their lavish wedding which is all set to happen in 2026



Taylor Swift had opened up about her wedding plans as Travis Kelce deals with retirement rumors



Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce are dealing with the star player‚Äôs retirement rumors as he gets heavily trolled amid an average season of the Kansas City Chiefs.But it seems the two are also looking into their wedding planning together, ahead of their lavish wedding in 2026.A few days ago, as per PEOPLE, a source has revealed that, "When it comes to wedding planning, nothing feels rushed or one-sided‚Ä¶‚ÄùThe source added, ‚ÄúThey‚Äôre both equally involved and excited, and this isn‚Äôt something one or the other is carrying on their own.‚ÄùAccording to PEOPLE, the source continued that, ‚ÄúThey‚Äôre approaching it as a partnership, talking things through together and enjoying the process in a way that feels natural to them."Despite the public status of their relationship, both Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce have remained tight lipped about their wedding plans, amid all the speculations.A few weeks ago, in October 2025, Taylor Swift appeared on the U.K.'s Heart Breakfast where she opened up about how she actually never thought about her wedding.Taylor Swift said, "You would think that I had been that type of person who would have obsessed over the idea of a wedding my whole life‚Ä¶‚ÄùThe popular billionaire pop star added, ‚ÄúBut I actually never thought about what I would ever do or what I would want‚Äîuntil I met the person."The billionaire pop star has also hinted that the two would be planning a big wedding, while rumors suggest that Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce might be considering Italy to be their destination for the wedding.At this point in time, Travis Kelce is getting trolled while many experts and analysts have hinted that the Kansas City Chiefs‚Äô tight end might just be announcing his retirement from the league soon.At the last match of the Kansas City Chiefs, when the team brutally lost against the Los Angeles Chargers, many members of the Kelce family along with Taylor Swift were present. This has sparked more rumors of a potential retirement as the team remains silent about it.Also Read: "You ruined my life": New court documents reveal disturbing details of what happened between Sherrone Moore and the woman he allegedly attacked
Article Summary: Taylor swift and travis kelce are fully focused on their lavish wedding which is all set to happen in 2026. A source revealed that, "when it comes to wedding planning, nothing feels rushed or one-sided‚Ä¶‚Äù the billionaire pop star has also hinted that the two would be planning a big wedding.

Article Title: Brandon Jones injury update: Broncos rally around defensive leader after heartbreaking season-ending setback
Article Text:
Brandon Jones (via Getty Images)

Broncos defense faces a major test, but Jones‚Äô message sets the tone

The Denver Broncos‚Äô Week 15 win felt like a very strong promise to see and envision a strong playoff push. However, the mood shifted once news broke that Brandon Jones would miss the rest of the season. The Denver Broncos safety suffered an unfortunate pectoral injury, which has now severely impacted what had been one of his most impactful years in the NFL Jones‚Äô spirit and determination seem to be intact despite the injury, as seen in his new post on Instagram. He put up an inspiring and confident message, updating everyone that he was mentally strong. His statement earned the respect of fans, with many of his NFL friends cheering him on.Soon after the injury became official, Jones shared a powerful Instagram post reflecting on his journey with Denver. Alongside photos from the season, he wrote, ‚ÄúDifferent lane, same direction. God never misses.‚Äù His teammates and fans responded with immense enthusiasm, showing their full support while also admiring his perseverance.Jones earned that level of respect through his constant dedication and consistency. He managed to play nearly every defensive snap and proved to be extremely dependable in tackling and situational awareness. Edge rusher Nik Bonitto praised his post, while defensive tackle DJ Jones added, ‚ÄúWe got you, cousin!!!‚ÄùFormer Miami Dolphins teammate Jevon Holland also chimed in with encouragement, writing, ‚ÄúThe comeback!!‚Äù Kicker Wil Lutz and cornerback Riley Moss added their own messages of support, reflecting how widely Jones is valued across the roster.On the field, the challenge now falls to the rest of the defense to adjust quickly.P.J. Locke is expected to take on a larger role, and while his numbers are modest, the coaching staff believes he can step up within the system. It will not be easy to replace a player who handled so many responsibilities, but the Broncos are not viewing this moment as the end of their run.Jones‚Äô absence is a serious blow, yet his determined mindset has already set the standard for the team. The defense plans to move forward with purpose, motivated by the idea of winning for a teammate who gave everything while he was on the field.Also read: Why did Denver Broncos decide to waive oldest tight end Mercedes Lewis just after 4 appearances
Article Summary: Denver broncos safety brandon jones has been ruled out for the rest of the season with a pectoral injury. Jones posted a message on instagram saying he was mentally strong despite the injury. His teammates and fans responded with immense enthusiasm, showing their full support while also admiring his perseverance.

Article Title: NBA injury update: Anthony Davis pushes through illness as Dallas Mavericks search for spark ahead of Philadelphia 76ers clash
Article Text:
Anthony Davis is currently ill (Image via NBA)

Anthony Davis powers through illness as Dallas Mavericks prepare for tough road test against Philadelphia 76ers

Anthony Davis‚Äô long-term future in Dallas faces fresh doubt as trade talk grows louder

The Dallas Mavericks, who have an uncomfortable 11-17 record and are ranked 11th in the West, will play the Philadelphia 76ers tonight. Throughout the season, the Mavs have appeared disconnected from success. Cooper Flagg, their newest recruit, had a difficult rookie season, and Anthony Davis, Luka Doncic's successor, is probably going to be replaced shortly.Despite being in challenging physical condition, Davis performed admirably in a victory against the Detroit Pistons last time out. Despite having a damaged left calf and an illness, the Mavericks big man continued to play a lot of minutes and had a great influence despite missing a recent game due to the ailment.On Saturday night, the Philadelphia 76ers (15-11) will play the Dallas Mavericks (11-17) in the second half of a back-to-back game. The upcoming 25th Anniversary Celebration Game, which is sponsored by Crypto.com and has a retro Hardwood Classic theme, will begin at Xfinity Mobile Arena at 7 p.m. ET.Without Anthony Davis, Dallas defeated the Detroit Pistons 116-114 in overtime on Thursday. With 23 points and 10 rebounds, top choice Cooper Flagg‚Äîwho turns 19 on Sunday‚Äîrecorded his fourth NBA double-double.The last time out, Davis made a valiant attempt against the Detroit Pistons. Despite nearly missing the game, Davis played a significant amount of time and finished with an outstanding 15 points, 18 rebounds, and 3 blocks in an overtime victory.In 37 minutes of action, he ended with 15 points, 18 rebounds, and 3 blocks to help the Mavs win 116-114 in overtime on Thursday. Davis stated after the game that although he is still feeling under the weather, he did his best to support his team's victory.‚ÄúStill feel under the weather,‚Äù Davis said. ‚ÄúI actually threw up twice during the game, but I‚Äôm just trying to compete. I‚Äôm just trying to do whatever I can to help the team win. Just leaving it all on the floor.‚ÄùThe Mavs will now travel to Philadelphia on Saturday to play the 76ers. Despite his illness, Davis is listed as probable for the forthcoming game. This season, Davis has made 12 appearances and averaged 19.6 points, 10.8 rebounds, 3.1 assists, and 1.8 blocks per contest.It's possible that Anthony Davis' future in Dallas won't be as unclear as the Mavericks would like. Despite Dallas's public indications that an extension might still be in the works, ESPN's Tim MacMahon stated this week that he anticipates Davis being dealt.‚ÄúThe Mavericks are telling people, ‚ÄòOh, we still might extend him this summer,‚Äô‚Äù MacMahon said. ‚ÄúIf you do that, that‚Äôs not gonna be good business for the Mavericks. I‚Äôm being told that and I don‚Äôt believe that.‚ÄúI‚Äôll put it like that. I think it‚Äôs a matter of when and not if Anthony Davis is traded. I just don‚Äôt know when.‚ÄùDavis may be the most likely trade departure since he gives the Bulls the most opportunity to recover choices, according to Sam Quinn of CBS Sports.‚ÄúA trade seemed certain the moment Nico Harrison was fired. Now, there‚Äôs a bit of uncertainty. The Mavericks are playing well. Kyrie Irving could return. Could Harrison‚Äôs dream be fulfilled by his successors? That‚Äôs the question mark here,‚Äù Quinn wrote.In August, Davis will be eligible for a four-year deal worth a maximum of $275 million. In addition to earning $54.1 million this season and $58.5 million the following year, he has a $62.8 million player option for 2027‚Äì2028.Also read: NBA injury update: Dallas Mavericks guard Dante Exum ruled out for entire season after knee surgery
Article Summary: The dallas mavericks, who have an uncomfortable 11-17 record and are ranked 11th in the west, will play the philadelphia 76ers tonight. Cooper flagg, their newest recruit, had a difficult rookie season, and anthony davis, luka doncic's successor, is probably going to be replaced shortly.

Article Title: Tee Higgins injury update: Cincinnati Bengals WR‚Äôs brutal concussion has a positive update as the team gears up to face the Miami Dolphins
Article Text:
Tee Higgins sustained brutal concussions in this season.(Image via Getty Images)

Tee Higgins‚Äô brutal concussion has a positive update as the Cincinnati Bengals gear up to face the Miami Dolphins



What happened to Tee Higgins as the Cincinnati Bengals recorded a poor season?



Tee Higgins, the Cincinnati Bengals‚Äô star player, has remained missing from the field ever since he sustained a brutal concussion against the Buffalo Bills for the second time in this season.While Tee Higgins‚Äô injury had sparked panic among fans, there have been a few new developments as the Cincinnati Bengals gear up to face the Miami Dolphins on Sunday night.In the last few days, the Cincinnati Bengals‚Äô star wide receiver has been a limited participant in the practice sessions.As per reports, Tee Higgins was recorded as a limited participant on Wednesday and Thursday. But it seems, things changed on Friday as he became a full participant in the practice session as the team geared up for Sunday night‚Äôs match against the Miami Dolphins.A few hours ago, Tee Higgins was listed as questionable for tomorrow‚Äôs match amid strong speculations of him being able to take the field against the Miami Dolphins.However, neither the team, the Cincinnati Bengals, nor Tee Higgins has responded to these speculations as they continue to be silent about this.While the Cincinnati Bengals recorded a pretty poor season on the field, Tee Higgins suffered quite a bit in this season as he sustained two concussions in a span of a few weeks.For the unversed, a few weeks ago, the team‚Äôs star wide receiver, Tee Higgins, sustained a concussion and had to miss the first round of the match against the Baltimore Ravens, which the Cincinnati Bengals had won.However, Tee Higgins was placed on concussion protocol and he ended up clearing it on 5th December to face the Buffalo Bills.As he geared up to play against the Buffalo Bills, Tee Higgins had opened up about his injury.The Cincinnati Bengals popular player said, "It was very scary‚Ä¶Any head injury is very scary. Thank God that I'm able to play again this weekend and keep playing for the rest of the season."Unfortunately, as luck would have it, Tee Higgins suffered a second concussion at the match against the Buffalo Bills as his head slammed into the ground.Also Read: Micah Parsons injury update: Insider reveals concerning details about his return next season amid the Green Bay Packers‚Äô tough stretch
Article Summary: Tee higgins sustained a brutal concussion against the buffalo bills. The cincinnati bengals star wide receiver has been a limited participant in the practice sessions. He became a full participant on friday as the team geared up for sunday night‚Äôs match against the miami dolphins.

Article Text:
Luka Doncic of the Los Angeles Lakers (Image via Getty)

Luka Doncic goes into Saturday night without a clear answer attached to his name. He is not listed as out or questionable for the Lakers‚Äô December 20 game against the Clippers, which usually points toward availability. Still, the situation is not clean. The Lakers are short-handed, and Doncic has dealt with small interruptions this season that make any appearance worth monitoring.Since arriving in February 2025, Doncic has carried a heavy load. The Los AngelesLakers depend on him to organize the offense, control pace, and close games. With the roster thinned by injuries, his presence or absence matters more than usual.The Lakers and Clippers meet again at Crypto.com Arena, a matchup that rarely needs added context. Both teams are chasing position in the West, and games like this often matter later when tiebreakers surface. If Doncic plays, the Lakers lean on his steady production, around 35 points, eight rebounds, and nine assists per game, alongside LeBron James, who is not listed on the injury report.There is no official injury keeping Luka Doncic off the floor. That stands out after earlier absences tied to personal reasons and minor issues such as a finger sprain.He remains the focal point of the offense and recently finished with 29 points in a win despite an uneven shooting night. His conditioning work has helped him handle long stretches with the ball, and if he plays, the Lakers expect him to run the game.Los Angeles Lakers are missing several rotation players, which tightens the margin for error.With Reaves and Vincent unavailable, ball-handling duties fall even more heavily on Doncic and James.The Clippers are also dealing with absences across the lineup.If James Harden plays, he becomes a direct matchup concern in isolation.
Article Summary: Luka doncic is not listed as out or questionable for the lakers‚Äô december 20 game against the clippers, which usually points toward availability. The lakers are missing several rotation players, which tightens the margin for error. With reaves and vincent unavailable, ball-handling duties fall even more heavily on doncic and lebron james.

Article Title: David Pastrnak and Rebecca Rohlsson‚Äôs love life: A look into the personal life, marriage, and family of the Boston Bruins right winger
Article Text:
David Pastr≈à√°k and Rebecca Rohlsson (Image Source: Getty)

David Pastrnak and Rebecca Rohlsson‚Äôs married life

David Pastrnak And Girlfriend, Rebecca Rohlsson, Expecting A Baby!

David Pastrnak and R–µb–µcca Rohlsson‚Äôs family

What does Rebecca Rohlsson do for a living?

Also read:

David Pastrnak is regarded as one of the NHL's star offensive players, who has been associated with the Boston Bruins in a long-term contract. In 2023, he signed an eight-year, $90 million deal with the Bruins, making him one of the NHL‚Äôs elite. Pastrnak is a Czech professional ice hockey right winger and alternate captain for the Boston Bruins of the NHL.Known for his unparalleled skills, unique goal-scoring abilities, and vision on the ice, he is one of the most prominent players who has gained not only fame, but a handsome amount of wealth as well. Besides maintaining a good rapport and balance in the team, Pastrnak has also maintained his personal and family life with the love of his life, Rebecca Rohlsson. Let‚Äôs explore the right-winger‚Äôs personal life, his family, marriage, love life, and more.David Pastrnak married Rebecca Rohlsson last year, and it was a private affair between close friends and family members. According to reports, the couple tied the knot in August 2024 at the Cathedral of St. Stephen in Croatia. The couple started dating and has been together for six years, until they disclosed their relationship in the year 2018.Reports suggest Rebecca is two years older than David Pastrnak, who was 28, at the time of their wedding. Though it was kept private, the ceremony was attended by many of Pastrnak‚Äôs current and former teammates, including David Krejci and Torey Krug, who served as groomsmen.Some other guests included Bruins players Brad Marchand, Charlie McAvoy, Jeremy Swayman, and Hampus Lindholm, along with former Bruins stars Patrice Bergeron, Zdeno Chara, and Linus Ullmark.According to Sportskeeda, David Pastrnak and Rebecca Rohlsson have two children as of now. Their daughter, Freya Ivy Pastrnak, was born in June 2023. Pastrnak faced a massive low in his life when the couple lost their baby. They also had a son, named Viggo Rohl Pastrnak, who tragically passed away just six days after his birth in June 2021.As per reports, Rebecca Rohlsson is an event planner and social media influencer, even though her personal wealth is on the smaller side. If you add up their assets, the couple‚Äôs total net worth is over $80 million, according to the latest reports from trustworthy sources. Rebecca Rohlsson's social media account on Instagram @rohlsson includes 102 posts, with 86.2k followers and 341 people in following, as of December 2025.
Article Summary: David pastrnak is a czech professional ice hockey right winger and alternate captain for the boston bruins of the nhl. In 2023, he signed an eight-year, $90 million deal with the bruins. He married rebecca rohlsson last year, and it was a private affair between close friends and family members.

Article Title: World Athletics president Sebastian Coe backs new British hope as his iconic 800m record gets worthy opponent in Ben Hoggins after 50 years
Article Text:
Sebastian Coe (via Getty Images)

Sebastian Coe‚Äôs words fuel belief in Britain‚Äôs next middle-distance star Ben Hoggins



Sebastian Coe: The Record-Breaking Legend Behind World Athletics #shorts

Some athletic records seem untouchable. Sebastian Coe ‚Äôs British 800-metre record of 1:41.73, set in 1981, is one of them. For almost 50 years, it has stood as the standard for every British middle-distance runner. Now, the conversation is shifting as new talent emerges and belief grows that the mark could finally fall.That belief has been backed by Coe himself. The World Athletics President has publicly praised the 23-year-old Olympian Ben Hoggins. His comments have added serious weight to growing expectations around British middle-distance running. With Scotland producing world champions and confidence rising across the squad, the moment feels right for a challenge to one of the sport‚Äôs greatest national records.Sebastian Coe has rarely spoken so openly about a young British runner. His praise for Hoggins reflects more than talent. It highlights mindset and belief. Speaking to Athletics Weekly, Coe said, ‚ÄúHe‚Äôs very talented, and you need to win things and with that comes an infectious confidence.‚ÄùHe then compared Hoggins to Britain‚Äôs current stars and said, ‚ÄúI‚Äôve seen that with Jake (Wightman) and Josh (Kerr) as well. You need to get up onto pole position ,and sometimes the rest of your career just follows.It‚Äôs a psychological breakthrough as much as anything.‚ÄùBritain is currently enjoying a golden era in middle-distance running.
